page.title: 12PAPWORTH'S STORAGE (ii)
page.content: The cost of storage is worked out on a tonnage of square foot basis,per week, month or year or at a fixed contract price for up to 3 years.The storage units are laid out in long rows with a rail track running alongside each row, sunk into the concrete so that lorries can pass over easily.80% of the freight comes by rail and is distributed localy by lorry.Fifteen people work at Papworths, all living locally.This includes 8 people from the previous Sugar Beet Factory on the site,the general manager, 2 secretaries and 5 workmen.A new storage unit will be ready in October to hold 24,000 tonnes of Interventian Wheat. With the river as a boundary to the site on one side,expansion into wharfage is planned.
